content.question: What is the volume of the solid generated when the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of <math alttext="y equals, x squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, and the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> is revolved about the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis?

topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
